duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and investigate medical device complaints and maintain quality documents to ensure compliance with regulatory agencies.
Coordinate the resolution of complaints and ensure timely investigations are performed.
Problem solve recurring, routine situations and refer more complicated situations to senior level personnel for resolution.
Maintain positive and cooperative communications with all levels of employees, customers, and contractors.
Perform other related duties and responsibilities as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
